creator: trevor@vocaro.com
text:
The attached test case works on Apache FOP 0.20.5, but it fails on 0.92beta. (It was generated by 
DocBook XSL 0.70.1.) To reproduce:

1. Download the attached file and place it in the FOP 0.20.5 root directory
2. Run "./fop.sh resume.fo resume.pdf"
3. You will see many errors, but the PDF will be generated
4. Download the attached file, and this time place it in the FOP 0.92beta root directory
5. From the 0.92beta directory, run "sh fop resume.fo resume.pdf"
6. The command will exit without printing any errors, but no PDF file is generated

I am using Java 1.5.0-6 on Mac OS X 10.4.7.

creator: trevor@vocaro.com
text:
Created attachment 18554
Test case showing regression on 0.92beta

creator: manuel@apache.org
text:
The fo file you attached works fine for me with the latest FOP trunk code. I 
have not got a 0.92beta version handy to test with.

In fop 0.92beta (FOP Version SVN tags/fop-0_92-beta) there is an error indeed:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.apache.fop.layoutmgr.inline.InlineStackingLayoutManager.addALetterSpaceTo(InlineStackingLayoutManager.java:296)

In fop trunk (FOP Version SVN trunk) the problem has been solved.
creator: spepping@apache.org
